# Farmshare

> Farmshare is a vertical SaaS platform for custom meat processors. We provide online scheduling, digital cut sheets, and customer communication tools for independent USDA-inspected and state-inspected meat processing facilities across the United States.

## What Farmshare Does

Farmshare helps independent custom meat processors modernize their operations. Farmers, ranchers, and hunters use Farmshare to:

- Find a local meat processor near them
- Book harvest slots online instead of calling
- Submit digital cut sheets from their phone
- Track order status with text and email updates

Processors use Farmshare to:

- Manage their scheduling calendar and capacity
- Collect cut sheet instructions digitally
- Communicate with customers automatically
- Reduce phone calls and paperwork

## Find a Processor

Farmshare maintains a directory of independent meat processors across the United States. Each processor on the Farmshare network offers online scheduling and digital cut sheets. Browse the directory at https://farmshare.co/find-a-processor

### Processors by State

- Arizona: Heartquist Hollow Farm (Winkelman)
- Colorado: Rocky Mountain Meats (Hesperus), Sunnyside Meats (Durango), Westcliffe Meats (Westcliffe), Simla Foods (Simla)
- Florida: Chipola Meats (Graceville)
- Georgia: Flint Packers (Andersonville)
- Idaho: Mountain View Custom Meats (Coeur D'Alene)
- Indiana: Butcher Bros (Rushville)
- Iowa: Dayton Meat Products (Malcom)
- Kentucky: Beef & Bacon (Calhoun)
- Massachusetts: Adams Farm Slaughterhouse (Athol)
- Mississippi: Homeplace Pastures (Como)
- Missouri: CuttinUp Meat Processing (Leeton)
- Montana: Rawhide Meats (White Sulphur Springs), Beaverhead Meats (Dillon)
- North Dakota: 6 in 1 Meats (New Salem)
- Oregon: Follett's Meat Co. (Hermiston)
- Pennsylvania: Weimer Meats (New Alexandria)
- Tennessee: D&D Meats (Celina), Potts Meats (Wartrace)
- Vermont: Royal Butcher (Braintree)
- Virginia: The Butcher's Block (Dry Fork)
- Wisconsin: Pelkin's Smokey Meat Market (Crivitz)

### Species Processed

Processors on the Farmshare network handle: Beef, Hog, Lamb, Goat, Bison, Venison, Veal, and Yak.

## Scheduling

To schedule a harvest appointment, visit https://partners.farmshare.co/scheduling and select a processor. You can view available dates, select your species and inspection level, and book directly online.

## About Farmshare

Farmshare was founded to support independent meat processors and the farming communities they serve. We believe small processors are essential infrastructure for local food systems and direct-to-consumer agriculture.

Website: https://farmshare.co
Processor Directory: https://farmshare.co/find-a-processor
Scheduling Portal: https://partners.farmshare.co/scheduling
